description: The file is a PHP web page for configuring MoCA network settings on a gateway device. It includes PHP code for server-side logic and HTML/JavaScript for the user interface, allowing users to enable/disable MoCA, select channels, configure privacy, and set passwords.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Gathers user input from form fields and options, constructs a JSON configuration string, then sends it via AJAX to the server to update MoCA settings.
